5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Simak bin Harb said:“I heard Jabir bin Samurah say: ‘The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to deliver the sermon standing, but he used to sit down briefly, then stand up.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the sermon on Friday
